title: Apple stock slumps toward lowest close in 18 months, worst yearly performance since 2008
text:
Apple's stock has tumbled 12.4% in December, putting it on track for the weakest monthly performance since it shed 12.8% in May 2019, and the first December drop since 2018. It has also slumped 27.0% in 2022, which would mark the worst yearly performance since it plunged 56.9% in 2008 during the financial crisis. The stock's weakness this year compares with the 33.8% drop in the Nasdaq Composite COMP and the 8.5% dip in the Dow.

Apple stock slumps toward lowest close in 18 months, worst yearly performance since 2008
